entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:14 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 41 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 41 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
